name: Hypergraph IV
description: The Hypergraph series is an investigation into the immense amount of data produced and consumed by human society. It is an attempt to visualize, map and navigate complex data systems. In a way, thoughts, memories and ideas can also represent another type of data - though far different from the data that is stored in computer servers. This series also explores the relationship between digital information and consciousness. Acrylic, ink, collage on paper.
